page.title: 12GAMES children play-at home
page.content: {Noughts and Crosses }There are two teams of ten people. One team is noughts and the other crosses.You set out nine chairs for the game.The first person of one of the teams sits in one of the chairs ,then the first person of the other team sits on another chair.The first team to get three people sitting in a row, vertically, horizontally or diagonally is the winner.{Pin the tail on the donkey Each person in turn is blindfolded and tries to pin the tail in the right place on the donkey.The one nearest to the right place wins.{Hide and Seek One person is chosen to be "it" and she counts to a certain number,say a 100.While she is counting the other people go and hide.When she has finished counting she shouts "Coming ready or not".The first one to be found is "it" next go.(Tracey Beardon)
